review: Very fine hardware and software.  Much praise to Amazon for producing what I believe to be the best streaming device on the market (head and shoulders above Roku).I have only one element of the Fire TV that needs serious attention:  there is no way to shut off the device without unplugging it from the wallsocket and disconnecting the HDMI cable from the TV.  The "Sleep" function is nice enough, but for those that rely on "over the air" public digital TV (such as myself), the Fire TV will blackout the TV signal completely to all stations (in my area at least) when left in the "Sleep" mode.  Again, to watch TV, one must unplug the Fire TV from the wall socket AND disconnect the HDMI from the TV.  This is extremely frustrating!Other than that one BIG problem, the unit is a gem!
